Description/Context: Debug dialogue that plays when the game tries to load a voiceline that doesn't exist in this document.
Dialogue: Sorry, the voiceline you tried to play doesn't actually exist.

Description/Context: Debug dialogue that plays when the voiceline exists in this document, but hasn't actually been recorded yet.
Dialogue: This voiceline hasn't been recorded yet.

Description/Context: Test dialogue that's just stolen voicelines from the Professor Layton games.
Dialogue: I knew you would be an asset in my battle against them!
What an ugly, little man you are!
Apparently, I made a pact with a small-minded dullard!

Description/Context: Test dialogue to make sure that multiple sentence voicelines work properly.
Dialogue: I have been waiting patiently for the perfect moment to make my grand entrance.

Description/Context: The neat thing is, this one doesn't actually exist. Its sole purpose is to trigger the voiceline not recorded voiceline.
Dialogue: Surprise, assholes! Turns out I was the Big Dog the whole time!
